channel.title: Need help please!
channel.description:
HELLO
i made a server called maccazscape.. my friend connected.. but i dont think anyone else can!?
it says
client handler: client null disconnected <there IP>
i dont think anyone can connect?
i port forward and all..
i will give u a link for the download to see if it works
http://www.mediafire.com/?9aa1k7fa7h645k9

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

Does it shows the black screen and then Disconnects? And do they use the same client?

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @jamie0910 jamie0910
item.description:
@jamie0910 wrote:

Hey im having this as well, People are logging in and out almost straight away… I’m not sure if it’s delta

If you can help, that’ll b great

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please!
item.dc:creator: @Killerswan Killerswan
item.description:
@Killerswan wrote:

If you are using Delta this is normal… It’s some annoying code put in to check which I forget what it checks…

It looks something like this right:


Connection from IP ADDRESS HERE
ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (IP ADDRESS HERE)

Read full topic
